message.dainty.restore.add.description: Adds to your inventory the items that you had just before you died

gui.obituary.title: Obituary

modmenu.descriptionTranslation.dainty: Shows information about what you are looking at.
gui.dainty.configuration.desc2: §fdisplays information§r about what §fyou are looking at§r.
gui.dainty.invalid_value_cant_save: Invalid value found. Please correct it before saving.
gui.dainty.forced_plugin_config: This option is controlled by the server
gui.dainty.disabled_by_mods: This option is disabled by the following mods:
gui.dainty.server_feature: This feature requires the server to have Jade installed
narration.dainty.by: Made with Love by Snownee. Press button to check out all my works!
narration.dainty.adjusting_position: Drag to adjust position. Press ESC to exit
config.dainty.display_tooltip_desc: The global switch to enable or disable the tooltip.
config.dainty.display_fluids_fallback_de: Only show fluid when there is no other target.
config.dainty.display_mode_desc: The behavior of the tooltip in the usual situation and how the ${SHOW_DETAILS} works.
config.dainty.display_mode_toggle_desc: Press ${SHOW_OVERLAY} will toggle it on and off.
config.dainty.hide_from_debug_desc: Hide the tooltip when displaying the debug screen.
config.dainty.hide_from_tab_list_desc: Hide the tooltip when displaying the player list.
config.dainty.hide_from_guis_desc: Hide the tooltip on most GUI displays.
config.dainty.perspective_mode_camera_de: Better compatibility with other mods that modify the behavior of the camera.
config.dainty.perspective_mode_eye_desc: Better accuracy when the player is moving.
config.dainty.reach_distance_desc: Increase the distance limit to the target.
config.dainty.item_mod_name_desc: Show which mod is an item from on its tooltip.
config.dainty.overlay_pos.exit: Click on the blank to exit
config.dainty.flip_main_hand_desc: Mirror tooltip position when main hand is left.
config.dainty.animation_desc: Animate the overlay when it appears and disappears. Morph the box when size changes.
config.dainty.reset_settings.confirm: Are you sure you wish to reset settings?
config.dainty.plugin_dainty.registry_nam: Show special IDs like BlockEntity and Fluid.
config.dainty.plugin_dainty.distance_des: Show the distance between the player and the target.
config.dainty.plugin_dainty.coordinates_: Show the position of the target.
config.dainty.plugin_dainty.block_face_d: Show the face of the block the player touches.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.tnt_stabi: Warn player of special TNT that ignites when hit.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.note_bloc: Show the note and instrument of the note block.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.next_enti: Show the time until the next entity drop, such as egg or armadillo scute.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.harvest_t: Show harvest information in creative or spectator mode as well
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.enchantme: Show the enchantment power of the block.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.item_stor: The amount of items to show when ${SHOW_DETAILS} is pressed.
The amount of items to show when ${SHOW_DETAILS} is not pressed.
The maximum amount of items to show item names instead of just item icons.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.energy_st: Only show energy info when ${SHOW_DETAILS} is pressed.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.fluid_sto: Only show fluid info when ${SHOW_DETAILS} is pressed.
config.dainty.plugin_minecraft.waxed_des: Show the waxed state of the block, such as waxed sign.
config.dainty.accessibility_plugin_desc: Enable accessibility features for displaying and narrating more details. You can then control more details in the Plugin Settings.
toast.dainty.please_wait.2: This may take a few seconds.
dainty.ignore_list.comment: This is an ignore list for the target of Jade. You can add registry ids to the "values" list.
dainty.message.should_sneak: Breaking the chest will delete your unique loot and all items in the chest! In order to break, you must sneak while doing so.
dainty.message.should_sneak2: As loot is %s, only break if really needed.
dainty.message.cart_should_sneak: Breaking the cart will delete your unique loot and items! In order to break, you must sneak while attacking
dainty.message.cannot_break: Loot containers and carts cannot be broken.
dainty.message.cannot_break_sneak: Loot containers and carts can only be broken while sneaking in creative mode.
dainty.message.decayed: The decaying container crumbles at your touch!
dainty.message.decay_in: This container will decay completely in %s seconds.
dainty.message.decay_start: The container begins to crumble at your touch! It will decay completely in %s seconds.
dainty.message.refreshed: The contents of the container are refreshed at your touch!
dainty.message.refresh_in: This container will refresh its contents in %s seconds.
dainty.message.refresh_start: The container will refresh with new contents in %s seconds!
dainty.message.invalid_table: Error with mod [%s]! The loot table for this container [%s] could not be found and loot was not generated. Please check your `latest.log` for loading errors.
dainty.message.invalid_block: The container that you have tried to open is invalid as it has not generated its identifier.
dainty.commands.usage: /lootr barrel | barrel <loot-table> | chest | chest <loot-table> | cart | cart <loot-table> | shulker | shulker <loot-table> | convert | custom <id> | refresh | decay
dainty.commands.create: Created a Lootr %s at %s using the loot table %s.
dainty.commands.summon: Summoned a Lootr Cart at %s using the loot table %s.
dainty.advancements.100loot.title: Centennial
dainty.advancements.100loot.description: Open 100 instanced, per-player Loot containers and collect your rewards!

dainty.advancements.50loot.description: Open 50 instanced, per-player Loot containers and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.25loot.title: Close Quarters
dainty.advancements.25loot.description: Open 25 instanced, per-player Loot containers and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.10loot.title: Disme A Dozen
dainty.advancements.10loot.description: Open 10 instanced, per-player Loot containers and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.1chest.title: 'X' Marks the Spot
dainty.advancements.1chest.description: Open your first instanced, per-player Loot chest and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.1barrel.title: Barrel Booty
dainty.advancements.1barrel.description: Open your first instanced, per-player Loot barrel and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.1cart.title: Tunnel Treasures
dainty.advancements.1cart.description: Open your first instanced, per-player Loot minecart and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.1shulker.title: Bounty Box
dainty.advancements.1shulker.description: Open your first instanced, per-played Loot shulker and collect your rewards!
dainty.advancements.social.title: Socialised Loot
dainty.advancements.social.description: Open one of every type of instanced, per-player Loot container in the world!
dainty.advancements.root.title: Belongs in a Museum
dainty.advancements.root.description: Bring instanced, per-player Loot into your world.

dainty.advancements.1337loot.description: Open a total of 1337 containers! Wow!
dainty.tooltip.not.enough.space: The area on the right-hand side of this screen is too small for the JEI ingredient list overlay to display.
dainty.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.nokey: Add a key binding for JEI bookmarks in your Controls settings.
dainty.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.key: Hover over an ingredient and press "%s" to bookmark it.
dainty.tooltip.bookmarks.not.enough.spac: The area on the left-hand side of this screen is too small for the JEI bookmark list overlay to display.
dainty.tooltip.bookmarks.recipe.remove: Remove the bookmark for this recipe.
The server must have JEI installed.
dainty.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.too: Recipe is too large to craft in the 2x2 player crafting grid.
dainty.tooltip.error.crash: This ingredient crashed when getting its tooltip. Please see the client logs for details.
dainty.tooltip.error.render.crash: This ingredient crashed when being rendered. Please see the client logs for details.
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.1: You do not have permission to use JEI's cheat mode.
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.di: On this server, it is disabled for all players.
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.en: On this server, only the following types of players can use it:
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.cr: players who are in the creative mode
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.op: players who have an operator status (/op)
dainty.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.gi: players who can use the "/give" command
dainty.key.category.hover.config.button: JEI (Hovering With Mouse Over Config Button)
dainty.config.name: Name: %s
dainty.config.title: %MODNAME Config
dainty.config.mode.description: Change the mode that JEI is operating in.
dainty.config.mode.cheatItemsEnabled.des: Give items instead of showing the recipe.
dainty.config.mode.editEnabled.descripti: Hide or unhide ingredients by clicking them in the ingredient list overlay.
dainty.config.interface.description: Options related to the user interface.
dainty.config.interface.overlayEnabled.d: Show the ingredient list overlay next to open GUIs.
dainty.config.interface.bookmarkOverlayE: Show the bookmark list overlay next to open GUIs.
dainty.config.client.appearance.descript: Config options to change the appearance of JEI.
dainty.config.client.appearance.centerSe: Move the JEI search bar to the bottom center of the screen.
dainty.config.client.appearance.recipeGu: The maximum height for the Recipes Gui (in pixels).
dainty.config.client.cheating.giveMode.d: Choose if JEI should give ingredients directly to the inventory or pick them up with the mouse.
dainty.config.client.cheating.cheatToHot: Cheat Items to Hotbar Using Hotkeys
Enable cheating items into the hotbar by using Shift + numeric keys.
dainty.config.client.cheating.showHidden: Enable showing ingredients that are not in the creative menu.
dainty.config.client.cheating.showTagRec: Show recipes for ingredient tags like item tags and block tags.
dainty.config.client.bookmarks.descripti: Config options related to Bookmarking ingredients and recipes.
dainty.config.client.bookmarks.addBookma: When true, add new bookmarks to the front of the list. When false, add them to the end.
dainty.config.client.bookmarks.dragToRea: Enable dragging bookmarks to rearrange them in the list.
dainty.config.client.tooltips.descriptio: Config options related to Tooltips in JEI.
dainty.config.client.tooltips.holdShiftT: Hold Shift to show bookmark tooltip features.
dainty.config.client.tooltips.showCreati: Show creative tab names in ingredient tooltips.
dainty.config.client.tooltips.tagContent: Show tag content in tooltips when browsing recipe ingredients.
dainty.config.client.tooltips.hideSingle: Hide tag content in tooltips when there is only one ingredient in the tag.
dainty.config.client.lookups.description: Config options related to looking up uses and recipes for ingredients in JEI.
dainty.config.client.lookups.lookupFluid: When looking up recipes with items that contain fluids, also look up recipes for the fluids.
dainty.config.client.lookups.lookupBlock: When searching for item tags, also include tags for the default blocks contained in the items.
dainty.config.client.input.description: Config options related to Inputs in JEI.
dainty.config.client.input.dragDelayInMi: Number of milliseconds before a long mouse click is considered dragging the mouse.
dainty.config.client.input.smoothScrollR: Scroll rate for scrolling the mouse wheel in smooth-scrolling scroll boxes. Measured in pixels.
dainty.config.client.performance.descrip: Config options related to performance optimizations in JEI.
dainty.config.client.performance.lowMemo: Set search to low-memory mode (makes search slow but uses less RAM).
dainty.config.client.advanced.descriptio: Advanced config options to change the way JEI functions.
dainty.config.client.advanced.catchRende: Catch render errors from modded ingredients and attempt to recover from them instead of crashing.
dainty.config.client.sorting.description: Config options related to how JEI sorts recipes and ingredients.
dainty.config.client.sorting.ingredientS: Sorting order for the ingredient list.
dainty.config.client.search.description: Config options related to how JEI searches recipes.
dainty.config.client.search.creativeTabS: Search mode for creative mode tab names (prefix: %).
dainty.config.client.search.searchAdvanc: Search in advanced tooltips (visible with F3 + H).
dainty.config.client.search.searchModIds: Search mod IDs in addition to mod names.
dainty.config.client.search.searchModAli: Search mod aliases (alternative names) that are added by plugins, in addition to mod names.
dainty.config.client.search.searchShortM: Search by the shorthand first letters of a mod's name.
dainty.config.client.search.searchIngred: Search ingredient aliases (alternative names) that are added by plugins, in addition to ingredient names.
dainty.config.client.ingredientList.desc: Config options related to the Ingredient List (the list of ingredients on the right side of the screen)
dainty.config.client.ingredientList.hori: Horizontal alignment of the ingredient list inside the available area.
dainty.config.client.ingredientList.vert: Vertical alignment of the ingredient list inside the available area.
dainty.config.client.ingredientList.butt: Visibility of the top page buttons. Use AUTO_HIDE to only show it when there are multiple pages.
dainty.config.client.ingredientList.draw: Enable this to draw a background texture behind the ingredient list.
dainty.config.client.bookmarkList.descri: Config options related to the Bookmark List (the list of bookmarked ingredients on the left side of the screen)
dainty.config.client.bookmarkList.horizo: Horizontal alignment of the bookmark list inside the available area.
dainty.config.client.bookmarkList.vertic: Vertical alignment of the bookmark list inside the available area.
dainty.config.client.bookmarkList.button: Visibility of the top page buttons. Use AUTO_HIDE to only show it when there are multiple pages.
dainty.config.client.bookmarkList.drawBa: Enable this to draw a background texture behind the bookmark list.
dainty.config.client.advanced.itemBlackl: List of ingredients that should not be displayed in the ingredient list overlay. Format: modId[:name[:meta]]. The hide ingredients mode will automatically add or remove entries here.
dainty.config.client.advanced.maxColumns: The maximum width of the ingredient and bookmark list overlays.
dainty.config.modIdFormat.modName.descri: Config options related to displaying Mod Names
dainty.config.modIdFormat.modName.modNam: Formatting for the mod names in tooltips for JEI GUIs. Leave blank to disable.
dainty.config.debug.debug.description: Config options to help developers debug issues in JEI
dainty.config.debug.debug.debugInfoToolt: Add debug information to ingredient tooltips when advanced tooltips are enabled.
dainty.config.debug.debug.crashingTestIt: Adds ingredients to JEI that intentionally crash, to help debug JEI.
dainty.config.debug.debug.logSuffixTreeS: Log information about the suffix trees used for searching, to help debug JEI.
dainty.config.colors.colors.description: Config options related to searching for colors of items in JEI
gui.dainty.category.recipe.crashed: This recipe crashed. Please see the client logs for details.
dainty.message.configured: Install the "Configured" mod to access the in-game config
dainty.message.config.folder: Or click here to open the JEI config folder instead
dainty.message.copy.recipe.id.success: The following recipe ID was copied to the clipboard: %s
dainty.message.copy.recipe.id.failure: Failed to copy the recipe ID to the clipboard because the ID is unknown
description.dainty.wooden.door.1: Wooden doors allow you to block monsters from entering your building.\nTesting sentences.
description.dainty.wooden.door.2: Clicking on a door changes its state from open to closed and vice versa.
description.dainty.wooden.door.3: Wooden doors can be opened/closed via redstone circuits.
dainty.config.itemsPerColumn.title: Items Per Column
dainty.config.itemsPerColumn.description: Changes the amount of items per column in the JEI dungeon and mob views
dainty.config.itemsPerRow.title: Items Per Row
dainty.config.itemsPerRow.description: Changes the amount of items per row in the JEI dungeon view
dainty.config.enchantsBlacklist.title: Enchants Blacklist
dainty.config.enchantsBlacklist.descript: Blacklist enchants from the JEI Enchants View
dainty.config.diyData.title: Use DIY data in the views
dainty.config.diyData.description: The build in compat code will not load and jsons will be loaded (requires MC restart)
dainty.config.dimensionsBlacklist.title: Dimension Blacklist
dainty.config.dimensionsBlacklist.descri: Blacklist dimensions from the JEI profiling scan
dainty.config.showDevData.title: Show extra information
dainty.config.showDevData.description: Mainly for pack devs. Features include but not limited to avg. blocks per chuck, entity ids, ...
dainty.config.hiddenTabs.title: Hide tabs added by JER
dainty.config.hiddenTabs.description: Tabs added by JER are 'dungeon', 'enchantment', 'mob', 'villager', worldgen' and 'plant'
dainty.dungeon.title: Dungeon Chests
dainty.enchantments.title: Enchantments
dainty.plant.title: Plant Drops
dainty.worldgen.title: World Gen
dainty.mob.title: Mob Drops
dainty.villager.title: Villager Trades
